org.apache.giraph.io

类 VertexReader<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.conf.DefaultImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
      • org.apache.giraph.io.VertexReader<I,V,E>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    V - Vertex data
    E - Edge data
    所有已实现的接口:
    ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    直接已知子类:
    BasicVertexValueReader, GeneratedVertexReader, SequenceFileVertexInputFormat.SequenceFileVertexReader, TextVertexInputFormat.TextVertexReader, VertexReaderWrapper

    public abstract class VertexReader<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends DefaultImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Analogous to Hadoop's RecordReader for vertices. Will read the vertices from an input split.

      How much of the input has the VertexReader consumed i.e.

    • 构造器详细资料

        public VertexReader()

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        public abstract void initialize(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputSplit inputSplit,
              org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TaskAttemptContext context)
                         throws IOException,
                                InterruptedException
        Use the input split and context to setup reading the vertices. Guaranteed to be called prior to any other function.
        参数:
        inputSplit - Input split to be used for reading vertices.
        context - Context from the task.
        抛出:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • nextVertex

        public abstract boolean nextVertex()
                            throws IOException,
                                   InterruptedException
        返回:
        false iff there are no more vertices
        抛出:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • getCurrentVertex

        public abstract Vertex<I,V,E,?> getCurrentVertex()
                                                                                                                                                                      throws IOException,
                                                                                                                                                                             InterruptedException
        Get the current vertex.
        返回:
        the current vertex which has been read. nextVertex() should be called first.
        抛出:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • close

        public abstract void close()
                    throws IOException
        Close this VertexReader to future operations.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getProgress

        public abstract float getProgress()
                           throws IOException,
                                  InterruptedException
        How much of the input has the VertexReader consumed i.e. has been processed by?
        返回:
        Progress from 0.0 to 1.0.
        抛出:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
